dialogue: What's the address for our meeting?
I'll tell you where to turn.
With all due respect, you are not a reliable navigation system.
You will be using your phone and you will forget to tell me when to turn.
If I point out your inattentiveness, you will snap at me.
I will be seething with anger for the entire drive, while wondering if I am already lost and don't know it.
Or you could tell me the address now.
I'll tell you when to turn.
